snippet.title: Tex-Mechs Trailer
snippet.description:
Play now on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/r4b4yla

Tex-Mechs is a fast-paced, first-person action game where players take control of a mech to fight hordes of horrifying creatures called “Crawlers” and reclaim the insect-infested wastelands of the alien colony, New Texas. To combat this menace, you’re armed with three powerful weapons: the trusty Mustang Revolver, the unstoppable Flamethrower, and the devastating Magnetic Ravager Saw. As one of the last Rangers, it is your responsibility to take back the canyon, put out the call to action, and help save New Texas.

This student-made game was created in 300 hours over the course of 20 weeks in one semester as part of the SMU Guildhall Team Game Production curriculum. It is the final Capstone game created by these students during their studies at SMU Guildhall, representing the culmination of two years spent in game development education.

Studio Aces: Alex Kennedy, Benjamin Cahill, Cale Curry, Christopher Kim, 
Erick Rodriguez, Helen Tang, Jake Klinkert, Jonathan Greenberger, Julia Corsi, Lamesha Coley, Lane Engelberg, Len Medina Estrada, Quest Washington, Tianmou Jayden Zhang, Yujia Max Liu
